thread.section_title: DriveAway Holidays Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveAway Holidays Australia | driveaway.com.au
thread.title: Victoria
thread.title_full: DriveAway Holidays Australia reviewed by Victoria

author: Victoria
title: Victoria
text: We have used DriveAway for our European bookings for several years. I am completely satisfied with the service they give. They reply very quickly to all queries (7 days a week). They will source the best location for car collection and drop off, depending on our requirements (e.g. in town, at the airport, near a train station etc). Their prices are competitive with any direct car rental reservations. Dealing with an Australian company (DriveAway) makes all our enquiries and reservations hassle-free. Highly recommended.
